title: How to Do a Friendly Challenge in Clash of Clans

parts.name: Challenging a Clanmate in Clash of Clans

steps.headline: Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.
Look for the Challenge button at the top of Clan chat and click on it.
Choose the base you want by clicking on the Replace Layout Icon and Request Clan Castle troops if you don't have any.
Press Start!
steps.description:
to issue the challenge. You can cancel the Challenge before anyone has started attacking. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/07\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg\/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/07\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg\/759px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":269,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":443.68131868131866,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Press on the Watch Live icon to watch your village attacked live.
See it as a normal Live Replay.
Press Return Home to return to your base.
Watch the Replay of the challenge or info[i] later if you like.
steps.description:
This clan is Thunder Gods, to search and enter this clan, type #YGJYCQQQ in the Search Clans option. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/YGJYCQQQ.png\/460px-YGJYCQQQ.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/YGJYCQQQ.png\/760px-YGJYCQQQ.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":259,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":428.02197802197804,"licensing":"

parts.name: Accepting a Friendly Challenge in Clash of Clans

steps.headline: Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.
Press Scout to view the village.
Press Attack again to confirm your attack in the Attack Now?
Watch the Replay of the challenge or info (i) later if you like.
steps.description:
This clan is Thunder Gods, to search and enter this clan, type #YGJYCQQQ in the Search Clans option. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/YGJYCQQQ.png\/460px-YGJYCQQQ.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/YGJYCQQQ.png\/760px-YGJYCQQQ.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":259,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":428.02197802197804,"licensing":"

text:
Challenging a Clanmate in Clash of Clans Open Clash Of Clans. Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left. Look for the Challenge button at the top of Clan chat and click on it. Choose the base you want by clicking on the Replace Layout Icon and Request Clan Castle troops if you don't have any. After clicking on the Replace Layout Icon, all available layouts will come choose from there. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d1/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d1/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg/760px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":258,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":425.9340659340659,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Add custom text if you don't like the default text (which is "Can you beat my village?"). {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fd/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fd/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg/759px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":195,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":322.5824175824176,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Press Start! to issue the challenge. You can cancel the Challenge before anyone has started attacking. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/07/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/07/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg/759px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":269,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":443.68131868131866,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Press on the Watch Live icon to watch your village attacked live. See it as a normal Live Replay. Press Return Home to return to your base. Watch the Replay of the challenge or info[i] later if you like. This clan is Thunder Gods, to search and enter this clan, type #YGJYCQQQ in the Search Clans option. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4f/YGJYCQQQ.png/460px-YGJYCQQQ.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4f/YGJYCQQQ.png/760px-YGJYCQQQ.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":259,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":428.02197802197804,"licensing":"

Clan search

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"} Accepting a Friendly Challenge in Clash of Clans Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left. Press Scout to view the village. The village will come up. Press Attack! to attack the village. Press Attack again to confirm your attack in the Attack Now? box. It will occur just like other enemy attacks. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/ba/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p2.jpg/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/ba/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p2.jpg/760px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":260,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":430.1098901098901,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Press Return Home to return to your base. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ae/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans6-p2.jpg/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans6-p2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/ae/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans6-p2.jpg/760px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans6-p2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":260,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":430.1098901098901,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Watch the Replay of the challenge or info (i) later if you like. This clan is Thunder Gods, to search and enter this clan, type #YGJYCQQQ in the Search Clans option. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4f/YGJYCQQQ.png/460px-YGJYCQQQ.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4f/YGJYCQQQ.png/760px-YGJYCQQQ.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":259,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":428.02197802197804,"licensing":"

Clan search

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"}
sentences: Challenging a Clanmate in Clash of Clans Open Clash Of Clans.
Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.
Look for the Challenge button at the top of Clan chat and click on it.
Choose the base you want by clicking on the Replace Layout Icon and Request Clan Castle troops if you don't have any.
After clicking on the Replace Layout Icon, all available layouts will come choose from there.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d1\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg\/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/d\/d1\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg\/760px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans4-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":258,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":425.9340659340659,"licensing":"

\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Add custom text if you don't like the default text (which is "Can you beat my village?").

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fd\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg\/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/fd\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg\/759px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans5-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":195,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":322.5824175824176,"licensing":"

\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Press Start!
to issue the challenge.
You can cancel the Challenge before anyone has started attacking.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/07\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg\/460px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/0\/07\/Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg\/759px-Friendly-Challenge-in-Clash-Of-Clans7-p1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":269,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":443.68131868131866,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Press on the Watch Live icon to watch your village attacked live.
See it as a normal Live Replay.
Press Return Home to return to your base.
Watch the Replay of the challenge or info[i] later if you like.
This clan is Thunder Gods, to search and enter this clan, type #YGJYCQQQ in the Search Clans option.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/YGJYCQQQ.png\/460px-YGJYCQQQ.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/YGJYCQQQ.png\/760px-YGJYCQQQ.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":259,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":428.02197802197804,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Accepting a Friendly Challenge in Clash of Clans Open Clan Chat by clicking or dragging the side arrow on the left.
Press Scout to view the village.
The village will come up.
Press Attack!
to attack the village.
Press Attack again to confirm your attack in the Attack Now?
box.
It will occur just like other enemy attacks.
